image_presets.base_prompt: A light source casting rays and creating shadows on simple objects

image_presets.name: Community Helper Scene
image_presets.description: Community helpers in their work environment
image_presets.base_prompt: A friendly community helper at work - firefighter, teacher, or doctor - in a simple work setting, grade 6 appropriate

image_presets.name: Goods and Services
image_presets.description: Visual showing goods or services
image_presets.base_prompt: A simple scene showing goods in a store or someone providing a service, child-friendly

image_presets.name: Historical Setting
image_presets.description: Simple historical or cultural scene
image_presets.base_prompt: A simple historical or cultural scene appropriate for grade 6, showing traditional elements without text

image_presets.name: Map-Style View
image_presets.description: Simplified map or geographical view
image_presets.base_prompt: A simple map-style illustration showing geographical features like mountains, rivers, and coastlines
